you've seen the biggest transition that the Free World economic
system has ever seen and that started with the ending of the cold war between

capitalist approach the reason I dwell on that for a moment is in fact

occasionally would drop a bit and that did not make Western
Electric happy Western Electric by the way was a manufacturing arm of Bell Telephone the big Monopoly at that

trying to figure out why these 4K dams occasionally dropped a bit it was a soft
drop you know a dynamic Ram bit for those of you who are not into those circuits it's basically a little
capacitor and it's a one if you have some electrons and it's a zero if you don't so dropping a bit basically meant
you either lost some electrons or gained some electrons in that capacitor problem was solved by a
well-educated super smart individual when the total technical forces of Intel
and Western Electric were unable to solve the problem and the solution went something
like this this young man his name is Tim May uh had heard Gordon Moore give a speech
Gordon Moore was talking about Moore's Law and so we were in now in the mid 70s
Gordon Moore postulated Moore's law in the mid-60s so he'd had 10 years of
shrinking dimensions and so forth and Gordon said effectively hey you know if
we keep this up for a long long time the dimensions will get so small that there's a possibility that circuits
could be corrupted or altered by some things like cosmic rays coming in from
the universe and hitting the circuit and making something happen and Tim had taken that to heart
and he started thinking about that and then he started thinking okay these Dynamic Rams are put in ceramic packages
Ceramics are basic aluminum oxide but they might have small amounts of impurities some of those impurities
might be radioactive they might be emitting things like alpha particles and
if one of those alpha particles were to hit the surface of the dye and create electron hole Pairs and those electrons
are collected in one of these little capacitors of this one of the bits of the dynamic Ram they could shift at
State and he was just thinking like this by himself he wasn't chartered to work on this problem he wasn't uh uh no one
was depending on him to solve the problem so late one night he got a whole bunch of ceramic piece Parts packages
they made out put them in a essentially a Geer counter let it count all
night with the parts in it let it count all next night without the parts in it determin there was a slight
radioactive content to these parts and then the conclusive experiment he he
demonstrated was in fact there was a small amount of Thorium in the aluminum oxide which was radioactive was decaying
giving off alpha particles the way he demonstrated this absolutely was to go to the ultimate alpha particle source
which you all know is a smoke detector smoke detectors work by
sending out alpha particles ioniz smoke particles collect them so forth really
ought to study smoke detectors but Tim knocked the cap off of
some of these 4kd Rams which were in a memory board bought the alpha particle
Source right to the top of the package and was able depending on how close he got get a 10 or 12 order of magnitude

surface now if you know a little bit about alpha particles they don't penetrate very far but the active surface of a silicon circuit is not very
